name: Apotheosis (Chaotic Good Entertainment)
description:
This is my entry for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam.

Unfortunately, I didn't have time to work on this until the last day. I looked at the timer and noticed I only had 5 hours left to participate. 

So I decided to see what I could come up with and make in under 4 hours. I ended up needing 3 hours to make the game and about half an hour to make this page and submit it.

This very limited time window was a very fun challenge for me, and I hope you can have a few minutes of fun with it as well!

Controls

Drag on your zombie character to launch it towards the human characters to try and turn them all into your new buddies.
